summary: This release introduces the new real-time collaboration engine, improves dashboard performance by 40%, and resolves several critical authentication bugs.

features.title: Real-time Collaboration Engine
features.description: Multiple users can edit documents simultaneously with live cursor tracking.

features.title: Dashboard Performance Overhaul
features.description: Load times reduced from 3.2s to 0.8s on average.

features.title: Bulk Export API
features.description: New endpoint supports exporting up to 10,000 records in a single request.

fixes.title: SSO token refresh loop
fixes.description: Fixed infinite redirect when SAML tokens expired.

fixes.title: CSV export encoding
fixes.description: Resolved UTF-8 BOM handling for Excel compatibility.
